event.description: Yunel Escobar strikes out swinging.
Kole Calhoun singles on a fly ball to left fielder Andrew Toles.
Mike Trout grounds into a force out, third baseman Justin Turner to second baseman Logan Forsythe. Kole Calhoun out at 2nd. Mike Trout to 1st.
Albert Pujols flies out to left fielder Andrew Toles.
C. J. Cron flies out to right fielder Yasiel Puig.
Cameron Maybin walks.
Andrelton Simmons singles on a ground ball to right fielder Yasiel Puig. Cameron Maybin to 3rd.
Danny Espinosa grounds out, pitcher Brandon McCarthy to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez. Cameron Maybin scores. Andrelton Simmons to 2nd.
Martin Maldonado strikes out swinging.
Yunel Escobar singles on a sharp line drive to center fielder Joc Pederson.
Kole Calhoun strikes out swinging.
Mike Trout strikes out swinging.
Albert Pujols homers (3) on a fly ball to left field. Yunel Escobar scores.
C. J. Cron flies out to left fielder Andrew Toles.
Pitching Change: Brandon Morrow replaces Brandon McCarthy.
Cameron Maybin singles on a ground ball to center fielder Joc Pederson.
With Andrelton Simmons batting, Cameron Maybin steals (5) 2nd base.
Andrelton Simmons pops out to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez in foul territory.
Danny Espinosa called out on strikes.
Angels challenged (tag play), call on the field was overturned: With Martin Maldonado batting, wild pitch by Brandon Morrow, Cameron Maybin to 3rd.
Martin Maldonado strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Steve Geltz replaces Brandon Morrow.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Ben Revere replaces Yunel Escobar.
Ben Revere flies out to center fielder Joc Pederson.
Kole Calhoun strikes out swinging.

Franklin Gutierrez remains in the game as the left fielder.

Tony Sanchez doubles (3) on a line drive to left fielder Franklin Gutierrez. Rey Navarro scores. Cliff Pennington to 3rd.
